cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to 999 (invalid value) will cause invalid PLMN configuration and network registration failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to 20 (exceeding valid range) will cause invalid TDD slot configuration and downlink transmission scheduling failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為 20（超出有效範圍）會導致無效的 TDD 時隙配置和下行鏈路傳輸調度失敗。
